summary: This document is an email chain from July 2, 2020, where Aaron Mysliwiec and Erica Dubno reach out to an unspecified office to reconfirm their interest in working together, referencing unspecified events reported in the news that day. The email references a prior exchange from May 15, 2020.

persons.name: Aaron Mysliwiec
persons.context: Sends an email on July 2, 2020, to an unspecified office to reconfirm interest in working together, referencing news events. Also sent a prior email on May 15, 2020.

persons.name: Erica T. Dubno
persons.context: Copied on the July 2, 2020, email from Aaron Mysliwiec, and is referenced as a collaborator in the outreach effort.

connections.description: Collaborators on outreach to an unspecified office, as indicated by being co-signatories on the email.

events.title: Outreach Following News Events
events.description: Aaron Mysliwiec and Erica Dubno send an email to an unspecified office to reconfirm their interest in working together, citing events reported in the news that day.

events.title: Prior Email Exchange
events.description: A prior email exchange is referenced, where Aaron Mysliwiec followed up with the office and was advised to reconnect later.

keyFacts: The email is dated July 2, 2020, and references unspecified 'events that were reported in the news today' as the impetus for reaching out.
The senders, Aaron Mysliwiec and attorney Erica Dubno, are attempting to maintain or establish a working relationship with an unspecified office.
The document shows a prior communication from May 15, 2020, indicating an ongoing dialogue.
The recipient(s) of the email are not named in the provided text.
